unnormalised: Okay, hear me out, Bollywood buffs! The chai is hot, the samosas are on the plate, and the gossip is piping! This week has been a rollercoaster, I tell you!

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor. Remember that adorable pic of Raha Kapoor at the Ambani pre-wedding bash in Jamnagar? Apparently, a little birdie (okay, maybe it was my cousin's best friend's neighbor's cousin who works at Dharma Productions) told me Ranbir almost tripped over his own feet trying to keep up with Raha during the celebrations! unnormalised: Then there's the whole "who's dating whom" saga. Word on the street is that Janhvi Kapoor and Shikhar Pahariya were spotted leaving Olive Bar & Kitchen in Bandra, *again*. Are they "just friends" who coincidentally always end up at the same restaurants? I think not! My spidey senses are tingling, and I smell romance brewing!

unnormalised: Speaking of restaurants, did anyone catch Karan Johar's latest Instagram story from Bastian? He was with Manish Malhotra, and I swear I saw a glimpse of Kiara Advani's hand reaching for a mocktail. Coincidence? Maybe. But Manish Malhotra *never* posts a story without a reason. My theory? He's designing her outfit for a new project! Think about it!
